definition: trade name of a company that produces musical recordings, distinguish (an element or atom) by using a radioactive isotope or an isotope of unusual mass for tracing through chemical reactions
details:
noun
- trade name of a company that produces musical recordings
= example: trade name of a company that produces musical recordings
= synonyms: recording label
- a brief description given for purposes of identification
= example: a brief description given for purposes of identification
- an identifying or descriptive marker that is attached to an object
- a radioactive isotope that is used in a compound in order to trace the mechanism of a chemical reaction
verb
- distinguish (an element or atom) by using a radioactive isotope or an isotope of unusual mass for tracing through chemical reactions
- distinguish (as a compound or molecule) by introducing a labeled atom
- pronounce judgment on
= example: pronounce judgment on
= synonyms: judge, pronounce
- assign a label to
= example: assign a label to
- attach a tag or label to
= example: attach a tag or label to
= synonyms: mark
